column4: ok ive downloaded streamtuner, now how do i find it to open up a file?
im trying to open a radiostation file
how do i find streamtuner
ok ive downloaded streamtuner, now how do i find it to open up a file?
how do i find streamtuner
im trying to open a radiostation file
how did you download it? whats the filename?
you said you downloaded streamtuner
what is the exact filename of streamtuner... how did you download that
ok, then look in your Applications
Sound and Video maybe?
likely, that would work
thats a pain, every time i want to change a radiostation i have to go through all that?
right-click on the .pls file and go to properties
and go to Open with, and set streamtuner
its not in the add list?
ok
does it work?
so its not working?
go to terminal and type which streamtuner
that will be the location
